text: Cravath, Swaine & Moore LLP (known as Cravath) is an American law firm with its headquarters in New York City, and an additional office in London. The firm, one of the most prestigious law firms in the United States, is known for its complex and high profile litigation and mergers & acquisitions work. ==References== Category:American law firms Category:1819 establishments in the United States
title: Cravath, Swaine & Moore
